detail.return_range: Expected return range between {{min}} and {{max}} (including fixed rental income and property appreciation)
detail.lock_period_content: To ensure the security of platform funds and investment fairness, each initial purchase of real estate tokens is set with a lock period. During the lock period, the assets cannot be transferred or sold.
detail.lock_period_content_1: Lock Period Duration: 2 days after purchase (or as specified in the property details)
detail.lock_period_content_2: Lock Period Restrictions: No transfer, no secondary market trading, no withdrawal
detail.lock_period_content_3: Lock Period End: Automatically unlocked, users can freely circulate or sell their tokens
detail.lock_period_content_4: Purpose: To prevent short-term arbitrage and malicious operations, ensuring the stability of the real estate token system

appealReason.title: Reason for Appeal
appealReason.placeholder: Please describe the issue you encountered in detail...

uploadEvidence.title: Upload Evidence
uploadEvidence.placeholder: (Transaction hash, dividend record screenshot, wallet transaction record)

content.1: Do not submit duplicate appeals during the review process.
content.2: False appeals may result in account restrictions.
content.4: For urgent issues, please call the customer service hotline: +031 234-5678

1.title: 1. Confirm Default
1.content-1: Check Terms: Compare the issuance file (white paper/contract/agreement) to confirm the default event.
1.content-2: Evidence: On-chain data (contract execution failure) + off-chain evidence (announcement/financial report/regulatory file).
1.content-3: Notification: Send a remedial request to the issuer (if allowed by the agreement).

2.title: 2. Legal Preparation
2.content-1: Determine Jurisdiction: Lock in the jurisdiction and dispute resolution method agreed upon in the agreement (litigation/arbitration).
2.content-2: Identify Responsibility: Identify the responsible party (issuer/custodian/guarantor) and locate their assets.

3.title: 3. Start Program
3.content-1: Filing: File a lawsuit/arbitration in the jurisdiction's court or arbitration institution (e.g., ICC).
3.content-2: Freeze Assets: Apply for temporary freezing of the responsible party's assets (account/cryptocurrency).

4.title: 4. Dispute Resolution
4.content-1: Prosecution: Submit default evidence and expert assistance to prove the loss.
4.content-2: Judgment: The court/arbitration tribunal makes a responsibility determination and compensation judgment.

5.title: 5. Execution Recovery
5.content-1: Cross-border execution: Apply for judgment execution in the asset's country (according to the New York Convention).
5.content-2: Disposition and Allocation: Seize and auction the assets, allocate them proportionally to the holders.

success.title: Redeem Successful
success.content: Your asset tokens have been successfully redeemed and transferred to the designated wallet. The transaction has been confirmed on the blockchain network.

error.title: Redeem Failed
error.content: Unfortunately, your asset token redemption could not be completed. Please check the reason for failure and try again.
error.error_message: The transaction failed due to insufficient network fees. Your wallet balance is not enough to cover the current gas cost. Please top up your wallet or adjust the gas settings and try again.

redemption.breachDescription: The developer failed to pay the rent on time, constituting a material breach. According to the token issuance agreement, the redemption clause is triggered.

hash.tokens_have_been_successfully_transferre: Tokens have been successfully transferred to your wallet
